featured.text: One day, she dusted off the story she had written for the writers’ group and decided to make it into a novel.
These buildings collapsed in heaps of dust and sand.
Left ______ for years, the deserted house was filled with a thick coating of dust and a smell of old damp wood.

definition.zh_def: 微小的固體顆粒，通常由土壤、灰燼或其他物質組成，常見於空氣或表面上。
definition.en_def: Fine, dry particles of matter that can accumulate on surfaces or be suspended in the air.
definition.example: I need to clean the dust off the shelves.
